Klasse Server

java.lang.Object
Server.Server
public class Server extends Object

Server

This is the Server for the Tic Tac Toe Game
!!!Attention the IPs must be set to the IPs of the Clients!!!
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Julian Lombardo, Diego Zwahlen, Lean Melone
